text: yaderake tomara allahara sathe sarika kare rekhecha, taderake kirupe bhaya kara, athaca tomara bhaya kara na ye, tomara allahara sathe emana bastuke sarika karacha, yadera samparke allaha tomadera prati kona pramana abatirna karenani. Ata'eba, ubhaya sampradayera madhye sasti labhera adhika yogya ke, yadi tomara jnani haye thaka.
